programme.title: Breakfast of Champions
programme.desc: An unhappy car dealer (Bruce Willis) believes that a dime-store author/philosopher (Albert Finney) has the answers to life's important questions.

programme.title: Pacific Heights
programme.desc: San Francisco yuppies (Melanie Griffith, Matthew Modine) restore a costly Victorian, then rent a studio to a landlord's nightmare (Michael Keaton).

programme.title: The Getaway
programme.desc: An explosives-expert thief (Alec Baldwin) and his wife (Kim Basinger) cross a crime lord and are chased to the Mexican border.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: In 1994 a 2004 Washington policeman (Jean-Claude Van Damme) saves his wife (Mia Sara) and stops a sinister senator from buying the presidency.

programme.title: The Temptations
programme.desc: Personal disputes and problems with drugs, alcohol and illness accompany the musical quintet's rise to fame.

programme.title: The Temptations
programme.desc: Personal disputes and problems with drugs, alcohol and illness accompany the musical quintet's rise to fame.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A fast talker (Eric Tsang) engages a Hong Kong rube (Jet Li) to track down the assassin of a sleazy Japanese businessman.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: A young woman flees New York City after being implicated in a murder and moves to Los Angeles, where she rents a room from a writer. They begin an affair, but it seems she's been followed by a homicidal duplicate of herself.

programme.title: Judgment Night
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: The Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: A teenager's investigation into his father's death leads him to a hidden city populated with menacing warriors.

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A teacher (Colin Firth), obsessed with soccer and a team that hasn't won a league cup in 18 years, begins a shaky relationship.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A shipwrecked 18th-century English physician recalls an odyssey that took him to four bizarre lands. From Jonathan Swift's book.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A shipwrecked 18th-century English physician recalls an odyssey that took him to four bizarre lands. From Jonathan Swift's book.
